attributes.action: expel the Sudanese ambassador to demonstrate the displeasure of the British people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: expel the Sudanese ambassador to demonstrate the displeasure of the British people at the jailing of Gillian Gibbons.

rejection.details: Mrs Gibbons has now been released.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
